ideas.title: AI-Assisted Configuration Creation
ideas.description: Use AI to suggest configuration patterns and auto-complete complex setups

ideas.title: Visual Configuration Editor
ideas.description: Create a GUI-based configuration editor for non-technical users

ideas.title: Collaborative Configuration Editing
ideas.description: Enable real-time collaborative editing of configuration files

ideas.title: Configuration Versioning System
ideas.description: Implement Git-like versioning for configuration files

ideas.title: Configuration Marketplace
ideas.description: Create a marketplace for sharing and discovering configuration templates

future_considerations: Integration with A6 for performance-aware CLI operations
Coordination with A10 for enterprise security features
User experience testing with real developers
Accessibility improvements for diverse user needs
Integration with popular IDEs and editors
implementation_insights: Interactive wizards must be fast and responsive to maintain user engagement
Auto-completion must be contextually relevant to be useful
Analytics must respect user privacy while providing valuable insights
Templates must be customizable and extensible for different use cases
Debugging tools must provide actionable insights, not just information
